title: Register Person of Interest
selectMethodTitle: Select How to Find Your Interest

placeholders.name: Enter full name
placeholders.appearance:
Describe appearance in detail
e.g., Black coat, red bag, wearing glasses
placeholders.platformName: Enter platform name (e.g., Discord, Slack, LinkedIn)
placeholders.gameName: Enter game name (e.g., League of Legends, PUBG)

hints.groupMatch: People in the same group will be matched
hints.hobbyComma: Multiple entries can be separated by commas
hints.platformDescription: You can register various platform information like Discord, Slack, LinkedIn
hints.gameDescription: Enter the nickname or ID used in the game
hints.nameDescription: This is the name that will be visible to the other party when matched
hints.birthdateDescription: Used for accurate matching when there are many people with the same name
hints.employeeDescription: Used for more accurate matching, all information is protected anonymously
hints.studentDescription: Used for more accurate matching, all information is protected anonymously

errors.selectPlatform: Please select a social platform first

alerts.contactsNotReady: Contact integration feature is in preparation.
alerts.basicLimitMessage:
Basic users can only register phone numbers, emails, and social accounts.
Subscribe to use more types!
alerts.basicCountMessage:
Basic users can register up to 3 items.
Subscribe to register more!
alerts.basicTypeMessage: Basic users can register only one item per type.
alerts.advancedLimitMessage:
Advanced subscribers can register only one item per type.
Upgrade to Premium for unlimited registration!

info.title: How to Increase Matching Rate
info.content:
• Enter accurate information
• Phone numbers and emails especially need to be accurate for matching
• Automatic matching occurs when users matching your criteria are found
• All information is protected anonymously until matching

search.title: Find Interest
search.subtitle: Find friends and interests
search.noSearchesDescription: Register searches to find people you're interested in
search.findByPhone: Find by phone number from contacts
search.findByLocation: Find person met at specific location
search.noMatchesDescription: When both register interest, you'll be matched
search.deleteConfirmMessage: Do you want to delete this person of interest search?
search.mismatchReportMessage:
Was the match with {{nickname}} incorrect?

Reporting a mismatch will cancel the match and return to waiting status.
search.mismatchError: An error occurred while reporting mismatch.
